sections.heading: One switch does one thing (press and release)
sections.body: Set up your switch to prank people with a fart noise. Make them laugh, make them say ewww or blame it on someone else!

sections.heading: What you'll need
sections.body:
Youâ€™ll need to record a fart noise onto a BIGMack talking switch.

Plug one of my switches into the BIGMack and position my switch so I can use it.
